snippet.title: Salmon farm 'grow zone' in Tas northwest
snippet.content: Salmon farming could be expanded into Tasmania's northwest and around King Island under a plan to be released by the state government. The region has been identified as a "grow zone" for salmon farming, with Petuna Aquaculture indicating a desire to look at expanding in the region. A Sustainable Salmon Industry Growth Plan will look at research and development, biosecurity and regulation in the area, the state government said in a statement on Wednesday. (C) AAP 2017
